SELECT A.MTNC_ID , A.MTNC_NM , A.SLT_ID , A.DVC_ID , A.WORKER_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.APPL_DTM,'%Y-%m-%d') APPL_DTM , A.CPMLT_YN , DATE_FORMAT(A.CPMLT_DTM,'%Y-%m-%d') CPMLT_DTM , A.REMARK , A.UPD_ID , A.UPD_DTM , B.SLT_NM , C.DVC_KIND , DL1.DL_CD_NM AS DVC_KIND_CD
FROM SLT_DVC_MTNC_MST A LEFT JOIN SLT_FCLT_MST B ON A.SLT_ID = B.SLT_ID LEFT JOIN SLT_DVC_INFO C ON A.DVC_ID = C.DVC_ID LEFT JOIN PLF_DL_CD_INFO DL1 ON C.DVC_KIND = DL1.DL_CD AND DL1.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND'
A.MTNC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || B.SLT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || C.DVC_KIND LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
SELECT COUNT(MTNC_ID) AS COUNT_ID FROM SLT_DVC_MTNC_WORK_INFO WHERE MTNC_ID = #{MTNC_ID}
